text: This cozy, family-friendly café is the perfect spot for a relaxed meal or sweet treat. Their menu features tasty light bites and a tempting selection of homemade cakes—especially the blueberry and banana cakes, which are so popular they sell out fast! On Saturdays, the café serves hearty, comforting main meals that are perfect for the whole family. With warm, attentive staff who make every visit feel special, it’s a place you’ll want to come back to again and again.
Ample comfy seats, the bulgogi beef wrap was really nice (just the right level of sweet) & the price is reasonable!

Located on the 2nd floor of Odeon Katong, this is a hidden gem where the food is great, the prices are very reasonable, the seating area is comfy and spacious, and the team running the cafe are professional, courteous, and caring! I especially love the muffins and the coffee (kopi gao)!
Had a very reasonable & yummy beef rendang pie ($5.50) with good coffee. The husband & wife team are very courteous & polite. I highly recommend this cozy hidden gem at The Odeon Katong,  2nd floor.

Wonderful taste of the food.
Excellent customer service
Good view of location
